Service Details: - Helps drivers remove their old, polluting vehicles from operation in exchange for cleaner modes of transportation by offering a variety of incentives ranging from discounts on new vehicles, car share credits, or money towards a mobility scooter or a bike - Kelowna vehicle Scrap-it locations are the Pick 'n Pull and Apply Valley Auto Wreckers
